reviewText: I am Monica Carrico, the "lost" star of this film. Working with Mark Griffiths was an extraordinary process, as he is an actor's dream director -- emotionally sensitive, with a sense of the underlying motivational forces driving each character in the story. I had many reasons for leaving the busines, none of which had anything to do with my experience on this film. I chose to pursue another, more personally and professionally fulfilling line of work.  Nonetheless, I am thrilled that Running Hot is receiving the attention it ought to have inspired at its release.
Tom and Kendra review Running Hot aka Lucky 13 aka Highway to Hell aka On The Run
